item.title: How to Scale and Tune Spark Effectively
item.description: If you’re working with big data, you’ve probably heard of Spark. Spark is a distributed big data processing engine that provides in-memory storage for intermediate computations, making it much faster than Hadoop MapReduce. In this post, we’ll cover how to scale and tune Spark effectively to make the most of its capabilities. 1. What is Spark? Spark is a distributed big data processing engine that uses the resilient distributed dataset (RDD) data structure with data abstractions such as DataFrames and Datasets.
